head.supplied: ¶ I Neptune, King of all living creatures in the sea, certify that Ferdinand Heinrich Müller has crossed the equator as a true believer, and assure him by this of my protection, which all my subjects...

div.p: RB MSS M197, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

MS is stamped with an illustration of Hermann von Beckerath.
Ich Neptunus, König aller lebenden Geschöpfe des Meeres, bescheinige, dass

als Rechtsgläubiger die Linie passirt und versichere ihn hierdurch meinen Schutz, wie auch alle meine Unterthanen ihn denselben angedeihen lassen; ausserdem hat sich Inhaber dieses für den Hayfisch zu hüten, indem ich diesen als Rebellen meines Reichs ansehe.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I Neptune, King of all living creatures in the sea, certify that Ferdinand Heinrich Müller has crossed the equator as a true believer, and assure him by this of my protection, which all my subjects will also provide to him. Nevertheless, the possessor of this document should beware of the shark, which I deem to be a rebel in my dominion.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Given at the bottom of the sea
